Package com.example.lotto649

Class FirestoreHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotto649.FirestoreHelper
public class FirestoreHelper extends Object
Helper class for doing common operations with our Firestore databse.

This class includes methods to get sizes of certain collections, and deleting entries in the databse.

This code was adapted from the firebase docs: https://firebase.google.com/docs/storage/android/upload-files
